About Our University

The University of Ostrava is a dynamic research institution which offers a high quality level of education and research in the humanities, social and natural sciences, health studies, medicine and fine arts. About 9000 students study in 6 faculties:

▪ Faculty of Social Studies

▪ Faculty of Education

▪ Faculty of Fine Arts and Music

▪ Faculty of Arts

▪ Faculty of Medicine

▪ Faculty of Science.

The small size of the university and its relative youth (our university celebrated its 30th birthday just last year) allows for a strongly individual approach to our students and flexible reactions to the needs of an up-to-date society and labor market. The university offers not only top quality education, but also many other possibilities for those who wish to fulfil their visions, whether it is studying other languages, founding a student organization, or gaining other practical experience. The university actively searches for opportunities for their students to raise their qualifications and help them kick off their careers. The university is simply an essential part of the city and its social life. We like to say that the whole city is our campus. Speaking of which, our university recently built a brand-new, cutting edge City Campus that is now welcoming its first students.

Degree Programmes

MATHEMATICS (BSc)

Do you prefer to work in a position with order and system in things? Do you want to make decisions based on data? Or create the data that decisions are based on? Or maybe you just like figuring things out. Those are often the prerequisites of a successful data analyst, banking expert or financial manager.

Studying Mathematics will bring you the opportunity to get a deep knowledge of Mathematics, logical thinking and advanced IT and computer skills. Do you see yourself in any such position? Keep reading and take your first step towards success.

Period of study: 3 years

Tuition fee: 2600 EUR/year

Deadline for application: 31 March 2024

Requirements:

Completed full secondary education.

Delivering a motivational video in English (to the designated UO cloud).

B1/B2 English language level (no certificate required)

Scholarship:

Accommodation scholarship: approx. 300 EUR/year

Extra scholarship for mobility

MATHEMATICS/FUZZY MATHEMATICS (MSc)

Do you prefer to work in a position with order and system in things? Do you want to make decisions based on data? Or create the data that decisions are based on? Or maybe you just like figuring things out. Those are often the prerequisites of a successful data analyst, banking expert or financial manager.

Studying Mathematics will bring you the opportunity to get a deep knowledge of Mathematics, logical thinking and advanced IT and computer skills. Do you see yourself in any such position? Keep reading and take your first step towards success.

Period of study: 2 years

Tuition fee: 2600 EUR/year

Deadline for application: 31 March 2024

Requirements:

Successful undergraduate/bachelor’s studies in Mathematics or a related discipline

Delivering a motivational video in English (to the designated UO cloud)

B2 English language level (no certificate required)

Scholarship:

Accommodation scholarship: approx. 300 EUR/year

Extra scholarship for mobility

ENGLISH PHILOLOGY (BA)

Do you want to work in an EU institution or as an embassy officer? Is the topic of Public relations close to you? Are you enthusiastic about writing or translating? Do you simply love American and British history and literature? Then you are in the right place at the right time.

Studying English Philology will bring you more than English proficiency. English Philology is a unique combination of language itself and English history and literature.

Our graduates go on to work in various positions and become international officers, tourism managers, translators and interpreters. Do you see yourself in any such position? Keep reading and take your first step towards success.

Period of study: 3 years

Tuition fee: 2600 EUR/year

Deadline for application: 15 May 2024

Requirements:

Successfully finished high-school studies

Certification: DET (Duolingo english test, at least 100 points), TOEFLiBT Certification (at least 80 and 18 in each part) or IELTS Academic Certification (at least 6.0, and 5,5 in each part)

Scholarship:

Accommodation scholarship: approx. 300 EUR/year

Extra scholarship for mobility

* see the FAQ

ENGLISH PHILOLOGY (MA)

Do you want to work in an EU institution or as an embassy officer? Is the topic of Public relations close to you? Are you enthusiastic about writing or translating? Do you simply love American and British history and literature? Then you are in the right place at the right time.

Studying English Philology will bring you more than English proficiency. English Philology is a unique combination of language itself and English history and literature.

Our graduates go on to work in various positions and become international officers, tourism managers, translators and interpreters etc. Do you see yourself in any such position? Keep reading and take your first step towards success.

Period of study: 2 years

Tuition fee: 2600 EUR/year

Deadline for application: 15 May 2024

Requirements:

Successfully finished Bachelor studies in English (or related field with English level at least C1),

Structured letter of motivation,

Structured summary of the applicant’s Bachelor thesis,

Certification: DET (Duolingo english test, at least 110 points), IELTS Academic (at least 6.5, and 6.0 in each part) or TOEFLiBT (at least 90 and 20 in each part)

Scholarship:

Accommodation scholarship: approx. 300 EUR/year

Extra scholarship for mobility

GENERAL MEDICINE (M.D.)

Are you ready to become a real-life hero with a white cape? Do you want to make a positive impact on the world by challenging yourself on a daily basis? Are you eager to study in a modern academic environment brimmed with culture in the heart of Central Europe, and follow a rewarding career in an ever-evolving scientific field?

If your answer is yes, then you just have to apply for our Degree Program in General Medicine!

Offering a range of intellectually stimulating and professionally challenging courses, our MD advances University of Ostrava Medical School’s core mission to alleviate human suffering by cultivating compassionate and skilled leaders of the global medical community.

Period of study: 6 years

Tuition fee: 11.000 EUR/year

Entrance exam: Test (Biology, Chemistry, Physics)

Admission period open: November 2023

Deadline for application: 15 April 2024

Requirements:

Successfully finished high school studies

English level at least B2 (no certificate required)

Entrance exam test

Scholarship:

Accommodation scholarship: approx. 300 EUR/year

Extra scholarship for mobility

What our students say about us

Frequently Asked Questions

Can I have part-time job while I am studying?

You can legally work and there is no hour or age limit (however, it is necessary to fulfil your studies properly) and many of our students do have a part-time job. Students work in different positions. Students from English Philology usually teach English in schools, students studying music become a part of an ensemble and students of Mathematics have various jobs in IT etc.

How about VISA, will anybody help me?

Of course. Every faculty has student’s specialist who is there to help Degree students with every step of their application process. Among other services (assistance during the whole admission procedure), our staff will help you with the VISA procedure as well. We have a high success rate of students applying for VISA.

What is the monthly cost of living in the Czech Republic?

Czech Republic has a very affordable cost of living (300 – 500 EUR/month). Detailed information can be found here: Cost of living in Czech Republic

What about accommodation, do you have a student dormitory?

Yes, University of Ostrava has and offers dormitory accommodation to its students. Degree students have priority over Czech students so you are guaranteed to get a spot. We also have a partner dormitory, so you can be 100% sure that you will get an accommodation. Our team will also help you during the procedure.

What about the language certificate?

Since you need the TOEFLiBT or IELTS Academic certificate, we have decided to pay you back with your expenses for these certificates. This offers will apply to accepted and enrolled students who had their certificate issued between 1.3. and 30.6. 2023.
